Uses of Class
com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalConfiguration

Uses of PayPalConfiguration in com.paypal.android.sdk.payments
 

Methods in com.paypal.android.sdk.payments that return PayPalConfiguration
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.acceptCreditCards(boolean acceptCreditCards)
          Optional boolean to indicate support for credit cards.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.clientId(String clientId)
          Required string - the client id from developer.paypal.com.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.defaultUserEmail(String defaultUserEmail)
          Optional string that pre-populates email login if no other information is available.

If your app has knowledge of the user's email, you can provide it here.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.defaultUserPhone(String defaultUserPhone)
          Optional string that pre-populates phone number login if no other information is available.

Same as email, but for phone number.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.defaultUserPhoneCountryCode(String defaultUserPhoneCountryCode)
          Optional string that indicates the country code of the specified defaultUserPhone.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.environment(String environment)
          Sets the environment to use.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.forceDefaultsOnSandbox(boolean forceDefaultsOnSandbox)
          Optional boolean for development.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.languageOrLocale(String languageOrLocale)
          Optional string value.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.merchantName(String merchantName)
          Your company name, as it should be displayed to the user when requesting consent for future payments.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.merchantPrivacyPolicyUri(Uri merchantPrivacyPolicyUri)
          URL of your company's privacy policy, which will be offered to the user when requesting consent for future payments.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.merchantUserAgreementUri(Uri merchantUserAgreementUri)
          URL of your company's user agreement, which will be offered to the user when requesting consent for future payments.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.rememberUser(boolean rememberUser)
          Optional boolean to control persistence of user.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.sandboxUserPassword(String sandboxUserPassword)
          Optional string for development.
 PayPalConfiguration PayPalConfiguration.sandboxUserPin(String sandboxUserPin)
          Optional string for development.
